can gyi sa'i chos rnams med par rig par bya'o/ /byas pa rtogs pa can gyi sa'i chos rnams med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o/ /nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen
po med par rig par bya'o/ /theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i
phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdag
med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o/ /shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pa med par rig
par bya'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa med pa'i phyir lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med par rig par bya'o/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med pa'i phyir phyir mi 'ong ba med par
rig par bya'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba med pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa med par rig par bya'o/ /dgra bcom pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' dang / theg pa chen po dang / dpag tu med pa dang /
grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar du med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/
tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs
su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o/ /shes pa po dang /
mthong ba po med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas med par rig par bya'o/ /rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' med par rig par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i
phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o/ /nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o/ /theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa
dang | tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor/ de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems
can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de
dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang bdag med pa'i phyir/ sems can med pa dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar du med par rig par bya'o//
shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o/ /nyan thos kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o/ /rang
sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med par rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi theg pa med pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med par rig par bya'o/ /rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa'i phyir nam mkha' med par rig par bya'o/ /nam mkha' med pa'i phyir theg pa chen po med par rig par bya'o/ /theg pa chen po med pa'i phyir
dpag tu med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / tshad med pa yod pa ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /tshad med pa yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor/
de ltar na theg pa chen po de ni sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar
bdag gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar gang yin pa de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
ni sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed do/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du theg pa chen po de'ang sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa
rnams kyi go 'byed de/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ ji ltar nam mkha' sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa de bzhin du/ theg pa chen
po de'ang sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams kyi go 'byed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa chen
po de la ni 'ong ba'am/ 'gro ba mi dmigs shing / gnas pa mi dmigs zhes smras pa ni/ rab 'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po de la ni 'ong ba dang 'gro ba
mi dmigs shing gnas pa mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni g.yo ba med pa ste/ de dag ni gang du'ang 'dong ba med/ gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/
gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med/ tshor ba
dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni
gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang
'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med/ tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni gang
nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba
med| gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mig gi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas
pa med/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i
phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin du mig gi de bzhin nyid dang / ngo bo nyid dang / mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med la/

rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ngo bo nyid dang / mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
'byor/ sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ngo bo nyid dang / mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med la/
chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ngo bo nyid dang / mtshan
nyid kyang gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang
du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med cing / chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ngo bo nyid dang / mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang
na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med cing / de bzhin nyid kyi de
bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ yang
dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med cing / rab 'byor/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i
mtha'i ngo bo nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ bsam gyis mi khyab
pa'i dbyings kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med cing / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis
mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /
rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid
dang | sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang
na'ang gnas pa med cing / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i de bzhin nyid
dang | shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas
pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med la/ rab 'byor/
dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/
gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med cing / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams
dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag
par rig pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag gi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/
gang na'ang gnas pa med la/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngo bo nyid dang / sangs rgyas
kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ byang chub kyi rang bzhin

ni gang nas 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med la/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid dang / byang chub kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang
du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med

la| sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab
'byor/ 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med la/ 'dus byas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi ngo bo
nyid dang / 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ 'dus ma byas kyi rang bzhin ni gang
nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med la/ 'dus ma byas kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi ngo bo nyid dang / 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid ni
gang nas kyang 'ong ba med/ gang du'ang 'gro ba med/ gang na'ang gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ de ltar na theg pa chen po de la ni 'ong ba mi dmigs/ 'gro ba mi dmigs/
gnas pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ theg pa de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus
kyang mi dmigs lags pas/ de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa lags te/ de'i slad du theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /zhes smras pa ni/ rab 'byor/ /de de
bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ theg pa chen po de la ni sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus kyang mi dmigs pas/ de ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi
theg pa yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus kyang 'das pa'i dus kyis stong / ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyang ma
'ongs pa'i dus kyis stong / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyang da ltar byung ba'i dus kyis stong / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyang dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis stong / theg pa chen po'ang theg pa chen pos
stong | byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong la/ rab 'byor/ stong pa nyid la ni gcig ces bya ba med cing / gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi'am/ lnga'am/ drug gam/ bdun nam
brgyad dam/ dgu'am/ bcu zhes bya ba'am/ tha dad du dbye ba med pa'i phyir te/ de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi theg pa
yin te/ theg pa chen po de la ni mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa mi dmigs so/ /de la ni 'dod chags dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang med
pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /gti mug dang / gti mug med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /ming dang / ming med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /zag
pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa
med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang mi dmigs
so| |'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /de la ni rtag pa dang / mi rtag pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /bdag dang /
bdag med pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /'dod pa'i khams dang / 'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /
gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs kyi khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par
'da' ba'ang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar de'i rang bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor/ 'das pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa'i gzugs kyis
stong ngo / /de bzhin du 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni 'das pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ ma 'ongs
pa'i gzugs ni ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma 'ongs
pa'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /rab 'byor/ da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni da ltar byung ba'i gzugs kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin du da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
rnams dang / da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pa ni/ da ltar byung ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs
su med pa'i phyir te/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba
dang | 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la 'das pa'i tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa
nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis
stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i gzugs dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med de/ stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyis stong pas dmigs su med na/ stong pa nyid la da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
la mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi dmigs so/ /mnyam pa nyid la ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs so/ /mnyam pa nyid la ni da ltar byung ba'i dus
mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la
'gyur| rab 'byor/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon
gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar
byung ba'i dus rnams ni mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs te/ rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
dang | da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams ni mi dmigs
so| |dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus mi
dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dmigs par lta ga
la 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam
dang | stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus
rnams su mi dmigs so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/ mnyam pa nyid la ni 'das pa'i dus mi
dmigs/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus mi dmigs/ da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs te/ mnyam pa nyid la mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ mnyam pa nyid la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
dang | da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag dmigs par lta ga la 'gyur/ rab 'byor/ gzhan yang so so'i skye bo ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs
so| |so so'i skye bo ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo ni da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ /so so'i skye bo ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/ gzhan yang nyan thos ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni
da ltar byung bar mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la de ltar bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /rab 'byor/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de la gnas
nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung
bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i theg pa chen po 'di legs par bka' stsal pa ni/ legs so/ /legs so/ legs so/ /bcom ldan 'das/
'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang theg pa chen po 'di la slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid thob par 'gyur lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa dag na mchis
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis/ tshad ma mchis pa de dag kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid thob par bgyid lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po lags te/ 'di ltar dus
gsum mnyam pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i theg pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab
'byor/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
kyang theg pa chen po 'di la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes so/ /brnyes par 'gyur ro/ /brnyes par mdzad do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong
pa las/ zil gyis gnon pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu drug pa/ de nas bcom
ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du bskul ba mdzad pas/ 'di ni theg pa chen po bstan par sems lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan
'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar theg pa chen po bstan pa'am/ gcig
tu ma gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ de ltar gyur pa med de/ rab 'byor/ khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun par theg pa chen
po ston pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi chos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams sam/ sangs
rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ dge ba'i chos gang ci'ang rung ba de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing / yang dag par
gzhol ba'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs rgyas kyi
chos gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dge ba'i chos de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang /
byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / bsam
gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
dang | mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / bsnyel ba mi
mnga' ba'i chos nyid dang / rtag tu btang snyoms su gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor/ de dag ni nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / sangs
rgyas kyi chos gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du 'dus shing / yang dag par gzhol ba'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi dge ba'i chos rnams yin no/ /rab 'byor/ de la theg
pa chen po gang yin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang /
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi
'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gang yin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid gang yin pa dang / chos rnams gang yin
pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang
lam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
dang / 'dus byas kyi chos rnams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang / sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi
khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams gang yin
pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gang yin pa dang / de bzhin
gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / bsam
gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings gang yin pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du
med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin pas/ rab 'byor/ rnam grangs des na/ khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mthun
par theg pa chen po ston pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/ theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa

dang | brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ theg pa chen po'ang gzhan/
dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan zhing / theg pa chen po'ang gzhan pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis
su dbyer med do/ /theg pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ de ltar na theg pa chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag
ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /rab 'byor/ de'i phyir theg pa chen po bstan pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan
pas theg pa chen po bstan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di
ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon gyi mthar khas mi len lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni phyi ma'i mthar khas mi len lags so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni dbus
su khas mi len lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs mu ma mchis pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes
dang | 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzugs byang chub
sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis shing / mi dmigs lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa'
zhes bgyi ba de lta bu'ang ma mchis shing / mi dmigs lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ma dmigs lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/
bdag bdag ces bgyi ba'ang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'ang / byang chub sems
dpa' mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar chos rnams rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags na/ gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon
par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags
so| |gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gang byang chub kyi
slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su ma mchis na/ ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par
bgyi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing / yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag mi dngang
zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe
dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len pa yin/ byang
chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar khas mi len pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su khas mi len pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ gzugs mu med pa'i phyir
byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya/
tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi thams
cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mi dmigs lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming
tsam du bas lags so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ dper bgyi na/ bdag bdag ces bgyi'ang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis
lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi'ang byang chub sems dpa' mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/ /zhes smra/ tshe dang
ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar chos rnams dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na/ gang mngon par ma grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon par ma
grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par ma grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /gang mngon par

ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma
grub ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam/ zhes smra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par
ma grub pa las rgud na'ang gang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so/ /zhes smra/
tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bstan ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum/ mi 'gong zhing yid 'gyod
bar mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing / dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o/ /zhes smra/
rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sems can med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sems can stong pa'i phyir
byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sems can dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
sems can dngos po med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len
to| |gzugs stong pa dang / gzugs dben pa dang / gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / rnam par shes pa ngo bo
nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi

len to/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi

len to/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
dang | dbus rnams kyang mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi mi'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin pas/ tshe
dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus gang
yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha'
dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ med pa'ang gzhan/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan/ dben pa'ang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa'
yang gzhan/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan

pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na med pa gang yin pa dang / stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dben pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gang yin pa dang / byang chub
sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i

bu| rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid med pa'i phyir byang
chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar khas mi len to/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su

khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid stong pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dben pa dang / nang stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha'

dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa dang / dngos po med

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /nang stong pa nyid

med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan la/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan zhing /

byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la/ sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid med pa dang / stong pa
dang | dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa
dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa
shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa
rnams med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams stong pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
dben pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de bzhin du yang dag
par spong ba rnams med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos

rnams stong pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dben pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi

len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i
phyir ro/ /med pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ stong pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ dpen pa'ang gzhan ma yin/ ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin zhing / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin la/

sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'ang gzhan ma yin zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na dran pa nye

bar bzhag pa rnams med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus
rnams gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang /
dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin thams cad med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings med pa dang / de bzhin nyid
med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ byang chub
sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med pa dang / yang dag
pa'i mtha'i bar du ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ med pa'ang gzhan/ stong pa'ang gzhan/
dben pa'ang gzhan/ ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du'ang gzhan zhing / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams
kyang gzhan pa ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na med pa gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i bar gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar
dang | byang chub sems dpa' dang / sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams gang yin pa de dag ni thams cad kyi thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du gnyis su med
cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /nyan thos stong pa dang / nyan thos dben
pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /rang sangs rgyas med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'

med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid

med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa

dang | ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /med pa dang / stong pa dang / dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan zhing / byang chub sems

dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyang gzhan la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams kyang gzhan ma yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na med pa dang / stong pa dang /

dben pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas de dag ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam
grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / dbus rnams su khas mi len to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ khyod gang 'di skad
du| tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ gzugs mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya/ zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' la ni
mtha' dang / dbus dang / mtha' mi dmigs kyang / nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du gzugs stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir gzugs kyi sngon gyi
mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la ni mtha'am/ dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs/ phyi
ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la ni mtha'am/ dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs mu med pa'i phyir byang chub
sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa

shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
dang | lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyir nam mkha' la mtha'am/ dbus mi dmigs kyang nam mkha' zhes tha snyad 'dogs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin
du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mtha'am/ dbus mi dmigs te/ stong pa nyid la mtha'am/ dbus dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/ /

tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mu med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' mu med par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du
tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir gzugs byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo / /

tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ stong pa nyid
la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs/ stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs la/ de bzhin du stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs/ stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems
dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med

cing mi dmigs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ stong pa nyid la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing / stong pa nyid la ni byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/

nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
ni| dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
rnams dang / lam rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings kyis stong ngo / /de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ngo / /yang dag pa'i mtha' ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ngo / /bsam gyis
mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyis stong ngo / /ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gyis stong ngo / /gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong ngo / /thams cad
shes pa nyid ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /nyan thos kyi theg pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pas stong ngo / /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo / /sangs rgyas
kyi theg pa ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas stong ngo / /nyan thos ni nyan thos kyis stong ngo / /rang sangs rgyas ni rang sangs rgyas kyis stong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong
ngo| |de bzhin gshegs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas stong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa stong pa nyid la ni gzugs med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin gshegs
pa stong pa nyid la ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs byang chub sems
dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med cing mi dmigs pa yin no/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de lta bu'ang med
cing mi dmigs pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das/ de ltar bdag gis thams cad kyi
thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / ma dmigs lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi zhes smra/ zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs la dmigs
su med do/ /gzugs ni tshor ba la dmigs su med do/ /tshor ba ni tshor ba la dmigs su med do/ /tshor ba ni gzugs la dmigs su med do/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dag ni 'du
shes la dmigs su med do/ /'du shes ni 'du shes la dmigs su med do/ /'du shes ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dag la dmigs su med do/ /'du byed rnams ni 'du shes
la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni 'du
byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes ni 'du byed rnams la med cing
mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams ni rnam par shes pa la med
cing mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
ri'i bu/ mig ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni mig la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba ni rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so//
rna ba ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni sna la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni mig dang / rna ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sna ni lce la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni lce la
med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dag la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lce ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni lus la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus
ni mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lus ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid ni yid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid ni mig dang / rna
ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ni gzugs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos
rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra ni sgra la med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra ni gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du dri ni dri dang / gzhan dag la'ang med cing
mi dmigs so/ /ro ni ro dang / gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /reg bya ni reg bya dang / gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos ni chos rnams dang / gzhan dag
la'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de dag la'ang de med cing
mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni de bzhin te/
yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzhan dag kyang de la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de'ang gzhan dag la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de ni gzhan dag la'ang med cing mi dmigs so/ /de la gzhan dag kyang med cing mi dmigs so/ /rna ba'i
'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang de bzhin te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi
'dus te reg pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la'ang reg pa gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni/ mig
gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de la'ang gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag la'ang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs
so| |rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'ang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
de la'ang gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag la'ang gzhan dag med cing mi dmigs so/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs
so| |de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po
dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing
mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad ni chos thams cad la med cing mi dmigs so/ /chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid
la med cing mi dmigs so/ /nang stong pa nyid ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo
bo nyid stong pa nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi bar la med cing mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin la
med cing mi dmigs so/ /ting nge 'dzin ni gzungs rnams la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs ni gzungs la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzungs ni ting nge 'dzin la med cing mi dmigs so/ /
so so'i skye bo'i sa ni/ so so skye bo'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa'i sa dang / mthong pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / byas
pa rtogs pa can gyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa'i sa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du rgyun du zhugs pa ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang
sangs rgyas ni/ rang sangs rgyas nyid la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa ni/
gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan pa la med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
ri'i bu/ de ltar na chos thams cad med cing mi dmigs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med cing mi dmigs te bstan du med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang
khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba de ni ming tsam du bas lags so/ /zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan
pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam zhes
bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi ming de ni phyogs bcu gang nas kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang gang nas
kyang mi 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro'o/ /'di ltar 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya ba dang / tshor ba zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa
zhes bya ba de dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa yin no/ /ming gang yin pa de'ang gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma
yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ming ni ming gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong la/ stong pa gang yin pa de ni ming ma yin pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de
ni ming tsam/ zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa med la/
sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang
med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni
ming tsam ste/ ming la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'ang ming med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar ming gang yin
pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags
pa yin pas/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar de ni ming tsam ste/ nang stong pa nyid las gud na'ang ming med la/ ming la'ang nang stong pa nyid med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las
gud na'ang ming med la/ ming la'ang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dag med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / nang
stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs
des na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhes bya ba de ni glo bur du ming du btags
pa ste/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang ming med la/ ming la'ang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar ming gang
yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba de dag ni/ glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na'ang ming med la/
ming la'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing
mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces
bya ba'i bar dag ni glo bur du ming du btags pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las gud na'ang ming med la/ ming la'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar ming gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang med cing mi dmigs
pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di skad du/ 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ bdag bdag ces bgyi ba'ang bdag
mngon par grub pa ni gtan ma mchis lags so/ /zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ bdag gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga
la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sems can dang / srog dang / skye ba po dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor
ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs gtan med cing mi
dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon
par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ mig gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang
lus dang / yid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par
'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe
dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ mig gi rnam par shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par
shes pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon
par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par
'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba ltag la yod/ rna ba
dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga yod/
tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par
'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams gtan med
cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang /
byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de dag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ nyan thos gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ rang sangs
rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/ byang chub sems dpa' gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtan med cing mi dmigs na/ de mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba lta ga la yod de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam
grangs des na bdag bdag ces bya ba'ang bdag mngon par grub pa ni gtan med pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang khyod 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir 'di ltar chos thams cad dngos

po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags na zhes smra/ zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar 'dus pa las byung pa'i ngo
bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gang gi 'dus pa las byung pa'i ngo bo nyid med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs
kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /

tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ mig gi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
dang | rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha
rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'dus pa las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po
med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos
thams cad ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin pa de gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin

no| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mi rtag pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa
shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar mi rtag pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o/ /de bzhin du chos thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma
med pa dang / smon pa med pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar smon pa med pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po med pa'o//
tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du chos thams cad ni dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rnam
par byang ba dang / 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar 'dus ma byas pa gang yin pa de ni zad pa'i dngos po
med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste/ gang dang yang bral bas ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa
shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang chos thams cad ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir chos thams cad ther
zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma
yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin du dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang
bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang /
kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ther zug tu gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang

bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir/
gang mngon par grub pa'i gzugs de gang lags/ gang mngon par grub pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang mngon par grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags
zhes smra/ zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mngon
par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ mig ni mngon par 'dus ma byas
pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mngon par 'dus
ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po med pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya
dang / chos rnams ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad kyi bar du'ang mngon par
'dus ma byas pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar mngon par 'du byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs
dang | tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnams ni mngon par ma grub pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir/
gang mngon par ma grub pa de/ gzugs ma lags/ gang mngon par ma grub pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma lags zhes smra/ zhes
zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de
la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do/ /gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa gang yin pa de la gzhan du 'gyur ba med do/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa gang yin pa de la skye ba med cing / 'jig pa med do/ /gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa
med pa de la gzhan du 'gyur pa med do/ /chos thams cad kyi bar du rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gang dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de dag la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med do/ /gang dag
la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de dag la gzhan du 'gyur ba med de/ rnam grangs des na gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /gang mngon par ma grub pa de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes
dang | 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir/ ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smra/ zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar mngon par ma grub pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa'o/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su
dbyer med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na kho bos 'di skad du/ ci mngon par ma grub pa de mngon par ma grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi
zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam/ zhes smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir/ mngon par ma grub pa las gud na'ang gang byang chub kyi slad du
spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis lags so zhes smra/ zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mngon par ma grub pa'ang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
ste| de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gzugs yang dag par
rjes su mi mthong / mngon par ma grub pa las gud na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par
ma grub pa dang / gzugs de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /de bzhin du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon
par ma grub pa dang / chos thams cad kyi bar de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gang
byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa yin no// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bcu bdun pa/ tshe dang ldan
pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyir/ gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi zhum mi 'god zhing / yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur
la| mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes smra/ zhes
zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad g.yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing / chos thams cad rmi
lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag ca lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag/ mi dngang zhing dngang
bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe/ gzugs khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi
bgyid cing / 'di ni gzugs so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de'i tshe tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
khas mi len cing / mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du de'i
tshe mig khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni mig go zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du de'i tshe rna ba
dang | sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni yid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid
lags so/ /de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o
zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du de'i tshe tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de'i tshe nang stong pa nyid khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni nang stong pa nyid
do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du de'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par
mi bgyid cing / 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni dran pa nye bar bzhag
pa rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams
dang | stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig
pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid do/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la/ gnas par mi bgyid de mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di dag ni ting nge
'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
