rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / byang chub
kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i slad du'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes pa ste/ gzugs kyi skye
ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de ltar na gzugs dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so//
de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /mig gi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mig ma lags so/ /rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang /
yid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni yid ma lags so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so/ /tshul
khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis
shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis
su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar
bzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de bzhin du
yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
dang | stobs bcu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma
skyes pa ste/ de bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing
gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du de bzhin nyid
kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags so/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas
pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ma lags
so| |de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ /bcom ldan 'das/
byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po
ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ de ltar na phung po rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de
ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o/ /khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni
khams dang / skye mched rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / 'grib pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /bcom
ldan 'das/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su
ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags
pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang
lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so/ /de
bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma
lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags
so| |bcom ldan 'das/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa
nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar 'grib pa ni
gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma lags so/ /
yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags te/ de ltar na lam dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de
ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam
ma lags so/ /de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma
mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad
du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni
gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /de bzhin du gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma
mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de'ang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnyis su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste nyi shu pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog/ /tshe
dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/ nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang khyod 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub gang yin pa nyid sems dpa' yin pas/ de'i
phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/ /byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do/ /chos gang dag gi rnam pa shes she na/
gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang mngon par zhen
pa med do/ /de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang
mngon par zhen pa med do/ /stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa shes
te/ de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos rnams 'dzin pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang
dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams dang / gzugs rnams sam/ sgra rnams sam/ dri rnams sam/ ro rnams sam/ reg bya rnams
sam/ chos rnams sam/ nang dang phyi'i chos rnams su 'dzin pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du/ shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /gang las ring du song zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las
ring du song / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad las ring du song / 'gro ba drug las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song
ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes
bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa
rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po dag las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song
ba zhes bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam
grangs des na 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gang yang khyod 'di skad du nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin zhes
zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi
rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go /gzugs
zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med
ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de
bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug
bsngal zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar
mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/
rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin
du| sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bde zhes bya ba dang /
sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma
yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin
du nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag
ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya
ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin du dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag par spong ba rnams
dang | rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi
'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes

bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces
bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
ni| chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par byed do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang
lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /de bzhin
du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so/ /zhes smra/ rab 'byor gyis smras
pa| tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang
ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo / /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ skye ba med
do| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha

rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i

bu| de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo / /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam

grangs des na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /

nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong

ngo / /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des

na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams
ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo / /dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do//
tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi
'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
pa nyid kyis stong ngo / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs
des na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir
khyod 'di skad du/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so/ /tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa
gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so/ /de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags/ zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar 'grib pa gang yin pa dang /
gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang /
gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar
mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin te/ de ltar na 'grib pa gang yin pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos
de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par
mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa
de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ gang yang gzugs zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma
mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs
su bgyis pa lags so/ /gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de'ang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so/ /zhes smra/ rab 'byor
gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin la/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang gzugs so/ /gzugs nyid
kyang skye ba med pa'o/ /skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam par
shes pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na gang yang gzugs zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/ /gang
yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/ /khams dang skye mched rnams dang / rten cing
'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so
yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin
la| skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
bu| rnam grangs des na gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par bgyid pa de'i tshe shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshor
ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ bdag gi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags
so| |shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sems can dang / srog dang / gso pa dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba
po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ khams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel
par 'byung ba'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /de bzhin du shin tu
rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par
dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma
mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang /
stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i
skye bo'i chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong
ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs
rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong
lags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don kho bos shes pa ltar na/ gzugs
ni skye ba med pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba med pa yin/ khams rnams skye ba med pa yin/ skye mched rnams skye ba med
pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stong pa nyid thams cad skye ba med pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
cu rtsa bdun skye ba med pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye ba med pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa yin/ so so'i skye bo'ang skye ba med pa yin/ so so'i skye bo'i
chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang
phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems
dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gal te gzugs
kyang skye ba med la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'ang skye ba med pa yin na ni/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ nyan thos kyis kyang / nyan thos kyi byang chub thob zin par mi 'gyur ram/ de de
bzhin du so so'i skye bos kyang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par mi 'gyur ram/ 'gro ba rnam pa
lnga'ang tha dad pa med par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub rnam pa lnga'ang thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ gal te chos thams
cad skye ba med pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rgyun du zhugs pas ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ lan gcig phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti
mug bsrab pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ phyir mi 'ong bas ni tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ dgra bcom pas ni gong ma'i cha dang
mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis ni rang byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/
ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi ched du dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag nyams su myong bar byed/ ci'i phyir de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa yod par mi 'dod do/ /kho bo ni
ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa nyid yod par mi 'dod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang / skye ba med pa la rang byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas yod par
mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang dka' ba'i 'du
shes kyis mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar dka' ba'i 'du shes la gnas pas ni/ sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par mi
nus pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'on kyang phar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed na sems can
dpag tu med/ grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par nus so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ ji ltar
bdag bdag ces bya ba'ang de ni thams cad kyi thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la'ang de ltar sems bskyed
par bya'o/ /gal te de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur na/ dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
ni thams cad kyi thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du chos 'ga' yang mi len cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni skye ba med pa la de bzhin
gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par mi 'dod do/ /chos ma skyes pas kyang 'thob pa ma skyes
pa 'thob par mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa 'thob bam/ 'on te skyes pa'i chos kyi
'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod la/ ma skyes pa'i chos kyis
'thob pa skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci 'thob pa'ang med la/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang med dam/ rab 'byor gyis
smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'thob pa'ang yod/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang yod de/ gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'thob pa dang / mngon
par rtogs pa dag ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'am/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'am/ dgra bcom pa'am/ rang sangs
rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa yin te/ don dam par ni 'thob pa'ang med/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang med/
rgyun du zhugs pa'ang med/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'ang med/ phyir mi 'ong ba'ang med/ dgra bcom pa'ang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' 'ang med/
sangs rgyas kyang med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ji ltar 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa
med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa bzhin du/ skye ba med pa'ang de lta yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan
pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na skye ba'ang mi skye la skye ba med pa'ang mi skye'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos ma skyes so/ /chos ma skyes so/ /zhes bya bar brjod
par spobs sam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'ang brjod par spobs sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ chos ma skyes so/ /
chos ma skyes so/ /zhes bya bar brjod par khyod spobs sam/ zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ chos ma skyes so/ /chos ma skyes so/ /zhes bya bar brjod pa'i spobs pa'ang kho bo
la med do/ /chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med par brjod pa'i spobs pa'ang kho bo la med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar chos ma skyes pa gang yin pa dang /
skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi skye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma
yin zhing gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/
tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ brjod pa'ang skye ba med/ spobs pa'ang skye ba med/ chos kyang skye ba med de/ gang dag las brtsams te brjod par bya ba'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin
nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni skye ba med pa'o/ /spobs pa ni skye ba med pa'o/ /chos ni skye ba med pa'o/ /gang dag las brtsams te
brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs skye ba med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med
pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang skye ba med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang skye ba med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
pa rab 'byor/ de de bzhin te/ brjod pa skye ba med do/ /spobs pa skye ba med do/ /chos skye ba med do/ /gang dag las brtsams te brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do/ /phung

po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin
thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du

skye ba med do/ /de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do/ /de ltar na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis 'gro ba lnga po dag tha dad pa yin gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin
no| |rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ji ltar 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du
yod pa de bzhin du/ 'gro ba lnga po dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis tha dad kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar don dam par ni las
kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med/ skye ba'ang med/ 'gag pa'ang med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang med/ rnam par byang ba'ang med pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
pa rab 'byor/ ci chos ma skyes pa skye'am/ 'on te chos skyes pa skye/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa skye bar yang mi
'dod la/ chos skyes pa skye bar yang mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ khyod chos ma skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni gzugs ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /kho bo ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /de bzhin
du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / byang chub ma skyes pa 'thob par mi 'dod/
mngon par rtogs par mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ chos skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
kho bo ni gzugs skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ kho bo ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa

skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/ kho bo ni byang chub kyi bar du skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do/ /shA ri'i bus

smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ci ma skyes pa'i chos skye'am/ skyes pa'i chos skye/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ma skyes pa'ang mi skye la/ skyes pa'ang mi skye'o//

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar skyes pa gang yin pa dang / ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de gnyi ga'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ skye ba
med pa'i phyir ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar gzugs skye ba med pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med
pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ lus kyi 'du byed rnams dang / ngag gi 'du byed rnams dang / yid kyi 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na brjod pa skye ba med/ spobs pa skye ba med/ chos skye
ba med/ gang dag las brtsams te brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni/ chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bzhag
pa'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni/ gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de nyid las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'di
ltar chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ ji ltar na chos thams cad la mi gnas pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa
shA ri'i bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis
ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ mig ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi
dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/
gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi
dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/
gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka
med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par
yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs
so| |tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka
med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med
par yang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
rnams dang / lam ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de dag ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /stobs rnams dang / mi
'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de dag ni nang na'ang mi gnas/
phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang
na'ang mi gnas/ /phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs des na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong
pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod bas gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /
tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol
tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su sbyang
bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa/ ji ltar byang chub kyi lam yongs su
sbyong bar byed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod do/ /de bzhin du
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang

yin| 'jig rten las 'das pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag tu gyur cing / dge sbyong
dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / sdug phongs pa dang / 'dren pa dang / slong mo pa zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la
ni bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog/ me tog phreng 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog phreng / spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos/ byug
pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa/ gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni gnas/ mal cha dang stan 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha dang stan/ 'tshog chas 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tshog
chas/ sman 'dod pa rnams la ni sman/ mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed cing / bu 'dod pa rnams la ni bu sbyin par byed/ bu mo 'dod pa rnams la ni
bu mo sbyin par byed/ chung ma 'dod pa rnams la ni chung ma sbyin par byed/ rgyal srid 'dod pa rnams la ni rgyal srid sbyin par byed/ mgo 'dod pa rnams la ni mgo sbyin
par byed/ mig 'dod pa rnams la ni mig sbyin par byed/ yan lag dang nying lag 'dod pa rnams la ni yan lag dang nying lag sbyin par byed/ sha dang / khrag dang / rkang 'dod pa rnams

la ni sha dang khrag dang rkang sbyin par byed la de'ang gnas shing yongs su gtong bar byed de/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o/ /'di ni len pa'o/ /'di ni sbyin pa'o/ /bdag ni ser sna med pa'o//
bdag ni sbyin bdag go/ bdag ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o/ /bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/ /bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /snyam
du sems shing sbyin pa de'ang byin nas/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bdag gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe 'di
la rang bde bar 'gyur zhing / len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig/ ces bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed do/ /de ni
chags pa gsum la chags shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / sbyin par 'du shes pa ste/
chags pa gsum po de dag la chags shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de ni 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
zhes bya zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g.yo mi 'phags shing mi 'da' ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten
las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o/ /de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
bu| 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ bdag tu mi dmigs/ len par mi dmigs/ sbyin par mi dmigs shing / de'i rnam par smin pa
la'ang mngon par dga' ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ sbyin pa de sems can thams cad la stobs par byed kyang sems can thams cad kyang
mi dmigs/ bdag kyang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs la/ sbyin pa de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed cing / byang chub
kyang mi dmigs pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing 'phags la 'da' ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no// //
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa/ bam po bco brgyad pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten pa'i yang yod/ 'jig rten las
'das pa'i yang yod de/ de la 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag
gis ser sna'i sems tshar bcad do/ /zhes dmigs pa la gnas nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de'ang bdag dang / sems can dang / sbyin pa'i 'du shes la gnas shing / de
bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ste/ dmigs pa la gnas nas/ phyi dang nang gi dngos po'am/ zin pa'am/ ma zin pa'am/ ci bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong
ba dang / de sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas shing / lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi dmigs pa la gnas te/ bdag tu lta ba la gnas/ sems can du lta ba dang / dge bar
lta ba la gnas shing / tshul khrims dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag la bsten pa tshul khrims dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing byang
chub dmigs nas/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / de bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod la/ bdag dang sems can dang / bzod par lta ba la
gnas shing / sems can thams cad kyis nyes par byas pa bzod par byed la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang / de lus dmigs shing / bsod nams kyi tshogs dmigs la/ ye shes kyi tshogs dmigs shing / bdag
dmigs la sems can rnams dmigs te/ byang chub dmigs shing / brtson 'grus brtsam ste/ de brtson 'grus brtsam pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / de byams pa
dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms sgom par byed cing / bsam gtan rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / snyoms par
'jug pa rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/ ldang bar yang byed cing / de dag gi ro myang bar yang byed la/ de dag gis rlom sems su'ang byed cing / dmigs pa'i lta ba
can du gyur nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba de ni 'jig rten pa'i 'o/ /de gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs/ tshor
ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs shing / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du dmigs nas stong pa nyid bsgom ste/ de
dmigs pa la spyod cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ de'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
yongs su bsngo ba dang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags pa dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang / bdag dang gzhan
gyi don gyi phyir dmigs nas/ thabs ma yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang / phung po gsum pa'i bsod nams thabs ma yin pas sems can thams cad
dang thun mong du byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba de ni/ 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ bdag dang / sems can dang / sbyin par bya ba mi dmigs pa'i shes rab 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang / sems can dang / tshul khrims dang / byang chub mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi
phyir tshul khrims yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang / bzod pa dang / byang chub mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang / lus dang / sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub
kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang / sems can dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi
dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad mi dmigs pas byang chub
kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang yongs su bsngo ba dug med pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba bla na med pa dang / yongs
su bsngo ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba mtshungs pa med pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba dpag tu med pas/ bla
na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa ste/ de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /ci'i phyir na/ 'jig rten pa zhes
bya/ ci'i phyir na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang dag gis 'jig rten du 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten 'grub par byed pa dang /
gang dag 'jig rten dang mnyam pa dang / gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi phyir sbyin pa dang / gang dag gis 'jig rten las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten 'byung
par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o/ /de la 'jig rten las 'das pa gang zhe na/ gang dag gis 'jig rten sgrol ba
dang / gang dag 'jig rten sel bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten gang dag gis sgrol bar byed pa dang / gang dag 'jig rten ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gis 'jig rten las
'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten las sgrol ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten du sgrol bar byed pa ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni de ltar byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong bar byed do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin no/ /yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang
chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang /
dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de dag ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi skyes bu'i rtsal yin/ rab 'byor gyis
smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad bskyed par
byed pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /
sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
par sangs rgyas bar gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
nyid la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa na gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nem nur med cing rmongs pa med par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
ni| 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi btang ba'i phyir/ 'di ltar gnas pa 'dis gnas pa yin par rig par bya ste/
de'ang mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/ /
shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po yid la byed pa'i yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar gnas pa des gnas pa de byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par 'dod na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ de ltar na sems can thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin par 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
na| tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad ni yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro/ /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ legs
so| |legs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang dag pa'i tshig brjod pas don de nyid yongs su bzung ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ dmigs su phebs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe
dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ sems can med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa med par rig par bya/ sems can stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya/ sems can dben pa'i
phyir yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya/ sems can ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya zhing / sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med
pa'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya ba'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzugs med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa med par rig par bya/
gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa dben pa nyid du rig par bya/ gzugs ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir
yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya/ gzugs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya'o/ /

de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa stong pa
nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa dben pa nyid kyi phyir yid la byed pa dben pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa ngo
bo nyid med par rig par bya'o/ /rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin du khams
rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / bden pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang /
ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin du
rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ rnam grangs
des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnas pa 'di dang / yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral lo/ /zhes kho bo smra'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa
rab 'byor la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor legs so/ /legs so/ /'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /ldeg /rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg
go| 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem
chem mo/ /shar phyogs dma' na nub phyogs mtho/ nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho/ lho phyogs dma' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho/ dbus
dma' na mtha' mtho/ mtha' dma' na dbus mtho bar gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag na'ang de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston
par mdzad do/ /de bzhin du phyogs bcu khor yug kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/ grangs med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par mdzad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu rnams las srog chags 'bum nyi khris mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ /phyogs bcu kun gyi
'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad
na'ang sems can dpag tu med/ grangs med pa rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad kyi yum/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //de nas stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal po chen po gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu 'khor de nyid du
'dus par gyur to/ /de bzhin du lha'i dbang po brgya byin rnams dang / rab 'thab bral rnams dang / yongs su dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
byed rnams dang / tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams kyang / tshangs pa'i bar dag dang lhan cig tu 'dus par gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na tshangs
pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag ji snyed 'khod pa rnams kyang lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu 'dus par gyur to/ /rgyal
chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od gang yin pa dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga'
dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od
gang yin pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/ /stong gi cha dang / 'bum gyi cha dang / bye ba phrag 'bum gyi cha dang / grangs dang /
cha dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi gan na/ lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od de
dag thams cad ni lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ni/ de dag gi nang na mchog tu snang ngo / /phul du snang ngo / /khyad par du
'phags par snang ngo / /rab dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med par snang ngo / /'di lta ste/ dper na/ dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi gan na lcags
nag po ni ka ba tshig pa bzhin du lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin no/ /de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyi gan na lha rnams kyi las kyi rnam
par smin pa las byung ba'i lus kyi 'od de dag thams cad kyang lham me ma yin/ lhan ne ma yin/ lhang nge ma yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ni de dag gi nang na mchog

tu snang ngo / /phul du snang ngo / /khyad par du 'phags par snang ngo / /rab dang / rab mchog dang / gya nom pa dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med par snang ngo / /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis
tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum
pa rnams dang / 'thab bral rnams dang / dga' ldan rnams dang / 'phrul dga' rnams dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang dag
'khod pa de dag thams cad btsun pa rab 'byor la chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dus te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa nyan par 'dod na/ btsun pa rab 'byor/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni ji ltar bslab par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad
ces smras so/ /kau shi ka/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la/ yid la zung zhig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par
bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya ba dag bstan par byas/ lha'i bu gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de dag gis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyis shig /gang dag yang dag pa skyon med pa
la zhugs pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mthu med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi mtshams bcad pa'i phyir
ro| |'on kyang gal te de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ kho bo ni dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad mi byed pas de dag la'ang rjes su yi rang ste/ khyad
par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams la lhag par dmigs par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ kau shi ka/'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas gzugs mi rtag
par yid la bya'o/ /sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa dang / nad dang / 'bras dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / gzhan la rag las pa dang / 'jig pa'i chos can dang / mi
brtan pa dang / rab tu 'jig pa'i ngang tshul can dang / 'jigs pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nad lta bur yid la bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /de bzhin du tshor
ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / de bzhin du mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / de bzhin du sa'i khams dang / chu'i
khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mi rtag par yid la byed do/ /sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / stong
pa dang / nad dang / 'bras dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa dang / gzhan la rag las pa dang / 'jig pa'i chos can dang / mi brtan pa dang / rab tu 'jig pa'i ngang tshul can dang / 'jigs
pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nad lta bur yid la bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas ma rig
pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya bar yid la bya ste/ de'ang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong par yid la byed do/ /'du
byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis
reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya
ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar
'gyur te/ de'ang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong par yid la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /rnam
pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ste/ de'ang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa
dang | zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par yid la bya'o/ /'du byed 'gags pas rnam
par shes pa 'gag /rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg
pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags
pas skye ba 'gag /skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar na sdug bsngal
gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ de'ang bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / dben pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
par 'du byed pa med par yid la byed de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi bsgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi
rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi
'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsgom mo/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan
yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/
de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyod do/ /de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
spyod do/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di ltar chos dang / chos rnams sbyor bar
byed cing / rtog sbyor du byed la/ yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / yongs su khyab par byed de/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni bdag med cing / bdag dang bdag gi dang bral ba'o/ /zhes so
sor rtog par byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi sems dang 'grogs pa
ma yin la/ yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin pa de'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems dang 'grogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/ kau shi ka/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni byang
chub kyi sems la med cing mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems la med cing mi dmigs/ byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de ni yongs su bsngo ba'i sems
la med cing mi dmigs/ yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin pa de'ang byang chub kyi sems la med cing mi dmigs la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems gang yin pa de'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems la
med| byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de'ang byang chub kyi sems la med/ yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin pa de'ang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la med de/ kau shi ka/ gang de ltar chos
thams cad la so sor rtog kyang / chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen pa med cing mi dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /de
skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa rab 'byor/ ji ltar na yongs su bsngo ba'i sems byang chub kyi sems
dang mi 'grogs pa yin/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngo ba'i sems dang mi 'grogs pa yin/ ji ltar na yongs su bsngo ba'i sems byang chub kyi sems la med cing mi dmigs
pa yin/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi sems yongs su bsngo ba'i sems la med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ kau shi ka/ yongs su bsngo ba'i sems gang yin pa de ni sems
ma yin la/ byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de'ang sems ma yin te/ de ltar na sems ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin la/ bsam gyis mi
khyab pa gang yin pa de'ang sems ma yin pas/ sems ma yin pas ni sems ma yin par yongs su bsngo bar mi byed la/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab par yongs
su bsngo bar mi byed de/ de ltar na sems ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni/ bsam mi khyab pa yin la/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang yin pa de'ang sems ma yin te/ kau shi ka/ de ni byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor/
legs so/ /legs so/ /rab 'byor/ gang khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston cing / spro ba bskyed pa ni yang khyod legs
so| |rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni byas pa gzo bar bgyi ste/ byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyi lags so/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa spyad pa mdzad pa na/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thad na de dag gi nyan
thos rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gdams shing rjes su bstan te/ yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
bgyis shing gzhug pa bgyis te bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpar gyur pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de la bslabs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin du bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
gdams par bgyi/ rjes su bstan par bgyi/ yang dag par bstan par bgyi/ yang dag par 'dzin du stsal par bgyi/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par bgyi/ yang dag par rab tu dga'
bar bgyi/ gzung bar bgyi zhing bzhag par bgyi lags so/ /bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gdams shing rjes su
bstan te/ yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du stsal/ yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bgyis shing btsud de bzhag pa rnams ni/ bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras
so| |kau shi ka/ de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la/ yid la zung zhig dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
la gnas par bya ba dang / ji ltar gnas par mi bya ba dag bshad par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/ kau shi ka/ de ltar na gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du
shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med
de| kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang mig ni mig gis stong / rna ba dang / sna dang /
lce dang / lus dang / yid ni yid kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/ de ltar na mig gi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang /
lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
dang | rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong / byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpas stong ste/ de ltar
na sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa
dang / byang chub sems dpa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ kau shi ka/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong / de bzhin du 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang /
reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ni rga shis stong / ma rig pa 'gag pa ni ma rig pa 'gag pas stong / de bzhin du 'du byed dang /
rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi 'gag pa ni rga shi
